Posted By: syrazemyla (3/21/2011 9:23:57 PM)

posts.post_content:
@ Lucky Monkey, I'm pretty sure if you have a spell that says "Deal X damage to target player", you can use it on either them or their plainswalkers. I'm almost certain that's the case, since the plainswalker functions as an shield for the player.   
  
Faith's Fetters is a great shutdown card with a nice life bonus. A great card to run with [Flickerwisp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flickerwisp) to bounce it onto new, higher priority targets, and gain an extra four life. Would be fun to figure out a combo where you can drop copies of these in play on all your opponents' permanents... wonder if there's a way....?
posts.html:
@ Lucky Monkey, I'm pretty sure if you have a spell that says "Deal X damage to target player", you can use it on either them or their plainswalkers. I'm almost certain that's the case, since the plainswalker functions as an shield for the player.

Faith's Fetters is a great shutdown card with a nice life bonus. A great card to run with Flickerwisp to bounce it onto new, higher priority targets, and gain an extra four life. posts.post_content:
To answer the equip-ability:  
If you play this on an equipment, all activated abilities that equipment has (like the equip ability itself) can't be played anymore. The equipment doesn't fall off though, and all static and triggered abilities work normally.
posts.html:
